Package.Name: On battle results statistics by RaJCeL (HEAVY MOD)
Package.Description: These are the WN8 statistics displayed on the battle results window, for all players.\r\n\r\nMod is downloading data from WG API while battle is loading/on countdown, so depending on a bandwidth there can occur micro freeze.
Package.UpdateComment: Version 1.5.1.1-1\r\nadded an option to remove badges; fixed functional issue from players context menu; fixed WG API link for NA

Package.Name: Session statistics by Awfultanker (Settings in garage available)
Package.Description:
Awfultanker Session Stats - based on Locastans Minimal Session Stats

Does it work with CW?
Awfultanker: Apparently not. I have never played a CW battle so I didn't know.

Package.Name: Session statistics Time Spent v{version} by ShuraBB
Package.Description:
>How do i change language of the Mod ingame? Post 248
The language is selected automatically by the client language. If the skin has no translation into the current language will be used EN version, and if not RU

The developer asks that if you like his work, please give him a positive rating on wgmods:
https://wgmods.net/search/?owner=70
Package.UpdateComment: 3.83_2018-12-18\nFixed a bug not taking into account the experience of the New year's action.

Package.Name: Basic skin (languages: RU)
Session Statistics by Tomonik v{version}
Package.Description: Shows your statistics for your tanks session in the notifications area of your garage \nGerman modified Version by dirty20067
Package.UpdateComment:
2019-01-15: updated xvmscales.json & expected_tank_values.json 
 
2018-11-17: only expected_tank_values.json updated


[0.9.22.0.1].r01 (14-02-2018) - Updated for 0.9.22.0.1.
- New macros added:
 {{bonds}}, {{totalDamageBlocked}}, {{avgBonds}}, {{avgDamageBlocked}}.
- Cache version changed from 6 to 7. Older cache files are no longer valid.

Package.Name: enable panels:
Package.Description: This option shows you panels for an overview of the current vehicle´s stats, your account stats, and session stats on the parameters panel (right side of screen in garage).

Package.Name: vehicle parameters
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.

Package.Name: "Research Watchdog"
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.
